Package arcade.patch.vis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PatchColorMaps
    Container class for commonly used color maps.
    PatchDrawer
    Container for patch-specific Drawer classes.
    PatchDrawer.Graph
    Extension of Drawer for drawing graphs.
    PatchDrawer.Label
    Extension of Drawer for drawing labels.
    PatchDrawer.LabelFieldPortrayal2D
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes font style.
    PatchDrawer.OvalPortrayal2DWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that change node colors.
    PatchDrawer.SimpleEdgePortrayal2DEdgeWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes edge colors based on weight.
    PatchDrawer.SimpleEdgePortrayal2DGridWrapper
    Wrapper for MASON class that changes thickness and color of edges.
    PatchDrawerHex
    Container for patch-specific Drawer classes for hexagonal patches.
    PatchDrawerHex.PatchCells
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing hexagonal cells.
    PatchDrawerHex.PatchGrid
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing hexagonal patches.
    PatchDrawerHex.PatchLayers
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing hexagonal lattices.
    PatchDrawerRect
    Container for patch-specific Drawer classes for rectangular patches.
    PatchDrawerRect.PatchCells
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing rectangular cells.
    PatchDrawerRect.PatchGrid
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing rectangular patches.
    PatchDrawerRect.PatchLayers
    Extension of PatchDrawer for drawing rectangular lattices.
    PatchVisualization
    Extension of Visualization for patch models.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PatchDrawer.CellView
    View options for cells.
    PatchDrawer.LatticeView
    View options for lattices.
